name: Slaughter Heist
description:
Play as Ezra in this puzzle-filled visual novel, as she tries to save her cow friend from slaughter!

Game by Mil Beges and Lucas Vially, made for the Weekly Game Jam 138: Hack.

The game takes around 30 minutes to play.

(if you happen to encounter an error try and ignore it or rollback. they shouldn't be gamebreaking)
